attributes.action: Increase the tax relief for landlords with only one main property.
attributes.additional_details: I propose to increase the tax relief for landlords with only one property under their name.
attributes.background: It is hard for middle-class workers to pay extra tax for rental income from their sole property; they had to rent it out because of a temporary reallocation due to work or childcare. They are paying tax on top of a normal mortgage and additional rent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306655
